short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scroll most webpages by holding down the RIGHT mouse button anywhere on the webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
McKay's - Right Mouse Button Scrolller  (Beta)

Created by:
Scott McKay and special help from 'em-te'

About:
Scroll webpages by holding down the RIGHT mouse button ALMOST anywhere on the webpage.

To use:  Just install.  Start surfing.  Press and HOLD right mouse button to scroll web page Up/Down  or Left/Right  

This extension is totally free... forever!  It's actually costing me 5 dollars to create google developers account.  Ha Ha   It's all for fun.

I do not ever collect any of your info.  

Since I don't collect any of your info, that means I don't ever transmit it to anyone else. Ha

This extension is 100% clean.  
This extension does not even access the internet.

Note:  Some webpage's (ex: Google)  could interfere with this extension.
